body_html:
Sorry, perhaps I misunderstand you. In your code here,

image = tf.cast(image, tf.string)
label = tf.cast(label, tf.string)

at the first glance I think that you want to convert an image to string, however it seems not true, right?

As show in your log, the exception is raised because tf.cast cannot convert float to string. However, the log is not enough to locate where the problem is. Hence I suggest you to check all your codes which contains tf.cast at first.

By the way, perhaps this question is better asked on StackOverflow. There is a larger community that reads questions there.

body:
Sorry, perhaps I misunderstand you. In your code here,
```python
image = tf.cast(image, tf.string)
label = tf.cast(label, tf.string)
```
at the first glance I think that you want to convert an image to string, however it seems not true, right?

As show in your log, the exception is raised because `tf.cast` cannot convert float to string. However, the log is not enough to locate where the problem is. Hence I suggest you to check all your codes which contains `tf.cast` at first.

By the way, perhaps this question is better asked on [StackOverflow](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/tensorflow). There is a larger community that reads questions there.
